subjects.title: Mathematics
subjects.description_zh: 掌握数学概念和解题技巧

chapters.title: Integers & Rational Numbers
chapters.description: Learn integer operations and rational number representations
chapters.description_zh: 学习整数运算和有理数表示
objectives: Represent rational numbers on the number line

sections.title: Introduction to Integers
sections.content: Integers include all positive numbers, negative numbers, and zero. They extend our number system beyond just counting numbers.
sections.content_zh: 整数包括所有正数、负数和零。它们将我们的数字系统扩展到计数以外。

sections.title: Subtraction Rule
sections.explanation: Subtracting a number is the same as adding its opposite.
sections.explanation_zh: 减去一个数等于加上它的相反数。

exercises.hint: Add 12 to -7. Think of moving right 12 spaces on the number line from -7.
exercises.hint_zh: 将12加到-7。想象在数轴上从-7向右移动12个位置。
exercises.explanation: (-7) + 12 = 5. Starting at -7 and adding 12 takes us to positive 5.

exercises.prompt: Express 0.2 as a fraction in simplest form.
exercises.prompt_zh: 将0.2表示为最简分数形式。
exercises.hint_zh: 想想0.2的含义：2个十分之一。

exercises.hint: Convert everything to decimals or place them on a number line.
exercises.hint_zh: 将所有数转换为小数或在数轴上标出它们的位置。

chapters.title: Algebraic Expressions
chapters.description: Learn to simplify and manipulate algebraic expressions
chapters.description_zh: 学习简化和操作代数表达式

sections.title: Like Terms
sections.content: Like terms have the same variables raised to the same powers. Combine coefficients of like terms.
sections.content_zh: 同类项具有相同的变量和相同的幂。合并同类项的系数。

exercises.hint: Group the x terms together and the y terms together.
Multiply 3 by each term inside the brackets.
exercises.hint_zh: 将3与括号内的每一项相乘。

exercises.hint: Like terms have the same variable with the same power.
exercises.hint_zh: 同类项具有相同的变量和相同的幂。

subjects.title: Science
subjects.description: Explore the natural world through scientific inquiry
subjects.description_zh: 通过科学探究探索自然世界

chapters.title: Lab Safety & Measurement
chapters.description: Learn essential lab safety rules and measurement techniques
chapters.description_zh: 学习基本的实验室安全规则和测量技术
objectives_zh: 记住关键的实验室安全规则

sections.title: Laboratory Safety
sections.content: Always wear safety goggles, tie back long hair, no food or drink in the lab, and report accidents immediately.
sections.content_zh: 始终佩戴安全护目镜，束起长发，实验室内禁止饮食，发生事故立即报告。

sections.title: SI Base Units
sections.content: The seven SI base units are: meter (m), kilogram (kg), second (s), ampere (A), kelvin (K), mole (mol), and candela (cd).
sections.content_zh: 七个国际单位制基本单位是：米(m)、千克(kg)、秒(s)、安培(A)、开尔文(K)、摩尔(mol)和坎德拉(cd)。

exercises.prompt: What is the SI unit for temperature?
exercises.prompt_zh: 温度的国际单位制单位是什么？

exercises.prompt: Match the instrument to the quantity it measures:
exercises.prompt_zh: 将仪器与其测量的物理量匹配：

chapters.title: Particulate Model of Matter
chapters.description: Understand how particles behave in different states of matter
chapters.description_zh: 理解粒子在不同物质状态中的行为
objectives: Describe particle arrangement in solids, liquids, and gases
objectives_zh: 描述固体、液体和气体中的粒子排列
将粒子运动与温度联系起来

sections.title: Diffusion
sections.content: Random motion of particles leads to mixing without stirring. Particles move from high to low concentration.
sections.content_zh: 粒子的随机运动导致不需搅拌就能混合。粒子从高浓度区域移动到低浓度区域。

choices: are fixed in position and vibrate
are far apart with weak forces
move very rapidly in all directions
choices_zh: 在所有方向上快速移动
exercises.hint: Think about the structure and movement in solids.
exercises.hint_zh: 想想固体的结构和运动。

exercises.prompt: Name the process when perfume spreads across a room.
exercises.prompt_zh: 香水在房间里扩散的过程叫什么？
exercises.hint: It's the spreading of particles due to random motion.
exercises.hint_zh: 这是由于随机运动导致的粒子扩散。

exercises.prompt: Arrange by average particle spacing (closest to furthest):
exercises.prompt_zh: 按平均粒子间距排列（从最近到最远）：
